weapons.name: Eldaryth of Regret (I)
weapons.attunement_process: Undo the Moment - To attune to the Sword of Regret, the character must: Enter a memory—real or magically induced—of a deep personal mistake or betrayal. Re-experience the moment and attempt to change the outcome. No matter what they choose, they awaken with blood on their hands and the sword bound to them.

curse.trigger: If not bathed in tears or blood within 1 minute of being drawn
curse.failure_effect: Dominated by sword (as dominate monster spell)

random_properties: All magical potions within 10 feet become diluted and non-magical
All magical scrolls within 10 feet become erased

defensive_stance.failure: Sword weeps and compels sheathing until next turn

weapons.lore: When [REDACTED] grew in power, he appointed an evil and ruthless lieutenant, [REDACTED], to act as his bodyguard and right hand. This despicable villain served as advisor, warlord, and assassin. His successes earned him [REDACTED] admiration and a reward: a sword with as dark a pedigree as the man who would wield it. For a long time, [REDACTED] faithfully served the [REDACTED], but as [REDACTED] power grew, so did his hubris. He aimed to supplant [REDACTED], so that they could rule the [REDACTED] empire in [REDACTED] stead. Legend says [REDACTED] destruction came at [REDACTED] hand, but [REDACTED] also wrought his rebellious lieutenant's doom, leaving only [REDACTED] sword behind. The world was made brighter thereby.

wondrous_items.name: Mantle of Shadow
wondrous_items.requires_attunement: by a warlock or a character bound to a Patron
wondrous_items.description: This black and shimmering mantle seems to drink in the light around it, its edges shifting as though alive with shadow. When donned, it binds the wearer to their Patron's will, granting abilities that blur the line between light and darkness.
